trans-unit.target: QXmlName строится из

trans-unit.source: A WinRT application may not do socket-based communication with another application running on the same host (as this would violate the sandboxing).
trans-unit.target: WinRT приложение не может сделать сокет на основе связи с другим приложением , работающим на том же хосте (как это нарушило бы песочницу).

trans-unit.source: A Cancel button defined with the RejectRole.
trans-unit.target: Отменить кнопку , определенный с RejectRole .

trans-unit.source: A Close button defined with the RejectRole.
trans-unit.target: Закрыть кнопки определяется с RejectRole .

trans-unit.source: A Commit button replaces the Next button on a commit page. Clicking this button simply calls QWizard::next() just like clicking Next does.
trans-unit.target: Commit кнопка заменяет Следующую кнопку на странице фиксации. Щелчок по этой кнопке просто вызывает QWizard :: next () точно так же, как при нажатии кнопки Далее .

trans-unit.source: A Discard or Don't Save button, depending on the platform, defined with the DestructiveRole.
trans-unit.target: Выбросьте или Не сохранять кнопку, в зависимости от платформы, определенный с DestructiveRole .

trans-unit.source: A Help button defined with the HelpRole.
trans-unit.target: Помощь кнопки определяется с HelpRole .

trans-unit.source: A No to All button defined with the NoRole.
trans-unit.target: Нет Все кнопки , определенной с NoRole .

trans-unit.source: A No button defined with the NoRole.
trans-unit.target: Нет кнопки определяется с NoRole .

trans-unit.source: A Reset button defined with the ResetRole.
trans-unit.target: Сброс Кнопка определяется с ResetRole .

trans-unit.source: A Restore Defaults button defined with the ResetRole.
trans-unit.target: Восстановить настройки по умолчанию кнопки , определенный с ResetRole .

trans-unit.source: A Retry button defined with the AcceptRole.
trans-unit.target: Повтор кнопку определяется с AcceptRole .

trans-unit.source: A Save All button defined with the AcceptRole.
trans-unit.target: Сохранить все кнопки определяется с AcceptRole .

trans-unit.source: A Save button defined with the AcceptRole.
trans-unit.target: Сохранить кнопку определяется с AcceptRole .

trans-unit.source: A Yes to All button defined with the YesRole.
trans-unit.target: Да Все кнопки , определенной с YesRole .

trans-unit.source: A Yes button defined with the YesRole.
trans-unit.target: Да Кнопка определяется с YesRole .

trans-unit.source: A modal dialog is a dialog that blocks input to other visible windows in the same application. Dialogs that are used to request a file name from the user or that are used to set application preferences are usually modal. Dialogs can be application modal (the default) or window modal.
trans-unit.target: Модальное диалоговое окно представляет собой диалог , который блокирует ввод в других видимых окон в одном приложении. Диалоговые окна, которые используются для запроса имени файла у пользователя или которые используются для установки предпочтений приложения, обычно являются модальными. Диалоги могут быть модальными для приложения (по умолчанию) или оконными .

trans-unit.source: A modeless dialog is a dialog that operates independently of other windows in the same application. Find and replace dialogs in word-processors are often modeless to allow the user to interact with both the application's main window and with the dialog.
trans-unit.target: Немодальным диалог представляет собой диалог , который работает независимо от других окон в одном приложении. Диалоги поиска и замены в текстовых процессорах часто являются немодальными, чтобы позволить пользователю взаимодействовать как с главным окном приложения, так и с диалогом.

trans-unit.source: A .dic file that is a dictionary containing words for the language
trans-unit.target: .dic файл , который представляет собой словарь , содержащий слова для языка

trans-unit.source: A CreateProcessArgumentModifier function takes one parameter: a pointer to a CreateProcessArguments struct. The members of this struct will be passed to CreateProcess after the CreateProcessArgumentModifier function is called.
trans-unit.target: Функция CreateProcessArgumentModifier принимает один параметр: указатель на структуру CreateProcessArguments . Члены этой структуры будут переданы CreateProcess после CreateProcessArgumentModifier функции CreateProcessArgumentModifier .

trans-unit.source: A MEMBER variable association is required if no READ accessor function is specified. This makes the given member variable readable and writable without the need of creating READ and WRITE accessor functions. It's still possible to use READ or WRITE accessor functions in addition to MEMBER variable association (but not both), if you need to control the variable access.
trans-unit.target: MEMBER переменная ассоциации требуется , если нет READ не указана функция сбруи. Это делает данную переменную-член доступной для чтения и записи без необходимости создания функций доступа READ и WRITE . По-прежнему можно использовать функции доступа READ или WRITE в дополнение к ассоциации переменных MEMBER (но не обе сразу), если вам нужно контролировать доступ к переменной.

trans-unit.source: A Mac0 map as specified by RFC 8152 (CBOR Object Signing and Encryption).
trans-unit.target: Mac0 карту как указано в RFC 8152 (CBOR подписывания объектов и шифрования).

trans-unit.source: A Mac map as specified by RFC 8152 (CBOR Object Signing and Encryption).
trans-unit.target: Mac карта , как указано в RFC 8152 (CBOR подписывания объектов и шифрования).

trans-unit.source: A Message object, which will be the
trans-unit.target: Объект Message , который будет

trans-unit.source: A NOTIFY signal is optional. If defined, it should specify one existing signal in that class that is emitted whenever the value of the property changes. NOTIFY signals for MEMBER variables must take zero or one parameter, which must be of the same type as the property. The parameter will take the new value of the property. The NOTIFY signal should only be emitted when the property has really been changed, to avoid bindings being unnecessarily re-evaluated in QML, for example. Qt emits automatically that signal when needed for MEMBER properties that do not have an explicit setter.
trans-unit.target: Сигнал NOTIFY не является обязательным. Если он определен, он должен указывать один существующий сигнал в этом классе, который излучается всякий раз, когда значение свойства изменяется. Сигналы NOTIFY для переменных MEMBER должны принимать ноль или один параметр, который должен быть того же типа, что и свойство. Параметр примет новое значение свойства. Сигнал NOTIFY должен выдаваться только тогда, когда свойство действительно было изменено, чтобы избежать, например, ненужной переоценки привязок в QML. Qt автоматически генерирует этот сигнал, когда это необходимо для свойств MEMBER, у которых нет явного установщика.

trans-unit.source: A READ accessor function is required if no MEMBER variable was specified. It is for reading the property value. Ideally, a const function is used for this purpose, and it must return either the property's type or a const reference to that type. e.g., QWidget::focus is a read-only property with READ function, QWidget::hasFocus().
trans-unit.target: READ функция аксессора требуется , если не MEMBER не был задан переменной. Он предназначен для чтения значения свойства. В идеале для этой цели используется константная функция, которая должна возвращать либо тип свойства, либо константную ссылку на этот тип. например, QWidget :: focus является свойством только для чтения с функцией READ , QWidget :: hasFocus ().

trans-unit.source: A RESET function is optional. It is for setting the property back to its context specific default value. e.g., QWidget::cursor has the typical READ and WRITE functions, QWidget::cursor() and QWidget::setCursor(), and it also has a RESET function, QWidget::unsetCursor(), since no call to QWidget::setCursor() can mean
trans-unit.target: Функция RESET не обязательна. Он предназначен для возврата свойства к его контекстному значению по умолчанию. например, QWidget :: cursor имеет типичные функции READ и WRITE , QWidget :: cursor () и QWidget :: setCursor (), а также имеет функцию RESET , QWidget :: unsetCursor (), поскольку нет вызова QWidget :: setCursor () может означать

trans-unit.source: A REVISION number is optional. If included, it defines the property and its notifier signal to be used in a particular revision of the API (usually for exposure to QML). If not included, it defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: Номер REVISION является обязательным. Если он включен, он определяет свойство и его сигнал уведомления, которые будут использоваться в конкретной версии API (обычно для доступа к QML). Если не указан, по умолчанию 0.

trans-unit.source: A Sign1 map as specified by RFC 8152 (CBOR Object Signing and Encryption).
trans-unit.target: Sign1 карту как указано в RFC 8152 (CBOR подписывания объектов и шифрования).

trans-unit.source: A Sign map as specified by RFC 8152 (CBOR Object Signing and Encryption).
trans-unit.target: Sign карты , как указано в RFC 8152 (CBOR подписывания объектов и шифрования).

trans-unit.source: A WRITE accessor function is optional. It is for setting the property value. It must return void and must take exactly one argument, either of the property's type or a pointer or reference to that type. e.g., QWidget::enabled has the WRITE function QWidget::setEnabled(). Read-only properties do not need WRITE functions. e.g., QWidget::focus has no WRITE function.
trans-unit.target: Функция доступа WRITE не является обязательной. Он предназначен для установки значения свойства. Он должен возвращать void и должен принимать ровно один аргумент либо типа свойства, либо указателя, либо ссылки на этот тип. например, QWidget :: enabled имеет функцию WRITE QWidget :: setEnabled (). Свойства только для чтения не нуждаются в функциях WRITE . например, QWidget :: focus не имеет функции WRITE .

trans-unit.source: A georectangle can never cross the poles.
trans-unit.target: georectangle никогда не могут пересекать полюса.

trans-unit.source: A georectangle is considered invalid if the top-left or bottom-right coordinates are invalid or if the top-left coordinate is south of the bottom-right coordinate.
trans-unit.target: georectangle считается недействительным , если верхние левым или нижней правых координаты являются недопустимыми или левым верхней координатой к югу от нижних правых координат.

trans-unit.source: A list can only store QML objects, and cannot contain any basic type values. (To store basic types within a list, use the var type instead.)
A list can only store QML objects, and cannot contain any basic type values. (To store basic types within a list, use the var type instead.)
trans-unit.target: list может хранить только объекты QML, и не может содержать какие - либо основные типы значений. (Для хранения основных типов в списке используйте вместо этого тип var .)

trans-unit.source: A locale object.

A matrix4x4 type has sixteen values, each accessible via the properties m11 through m44 in QML (in row/column order). Values of this type can be composed with the Qt.matrix4x4() function. Each attribute in a matrix4x4 is stored as a real (single-precision on ARM, double-precision on x86).
trans-unit.target: Тип matrix4x4 имеет шестнадцать значений, каждое из которых доступно через свойства с m11 по m44 в QML (в порядке строки / столбца). Значения этого типа могут быть составлены с помощью функции Qt.matrix4x4 (). Каждый атрибут в matrix4x4 хранится как вещественный (одинарная точность на ARM, двойная точность на x86).

trans-unit.source: A quaternion type has scalar, x, y and z attributes.
trans-unit.target: Тип quaternion имеет атрибуты scalar , x , y и z .

trans-unit.source: A variant type property can also hold an image or pixmap. A variant which contains a QPixmap or QImage is known as a "scarce resource" and the declarative engine will attempt to automatically release such resources after evaluation of any JavaScript expression which requires one to be copied has completed.
trans-unit.target: variant свойство типа также может содержать изображение или растровое изображение. variant , который содержит QPixmap или QImage известен как «дефицитный ресурс» и декларативный двигатель будет пытаться автоматически освободить такие ресурсы после оценки любого выражения JavaScript , который требует, чтобы быть скопированы завершено.

trans-unit.source: A vector2d type has x and y attributes, otherwise it is similar to the vector3d type. Please see the documentation about the vector3d type for more information.
trans-unit.target: Тип vector2d имеет атрибуты x и y , в остальном он похож на тип vector3d . Дополнительную информацию см. В документации по типу vector3d .

trans-unit.source: A vector4d type has x, y, z and w attributes, otherwise it is similar to the vector3d type. Please see the documentation about the vector3d type for more information.
trans-unit.target: Тип vector4d имеет атрибуты x , y , z и w , в остальном он похож на тип vector3d . Дополнительную информацию см. В документации по типу vector3d .

trans-unit.source: A Backtab occurred. The input for this may include the Shift or Control keys; e.g. Shift+Tab.
trans-unit.target: Произошёл бэктаб.Вход для этого может включать в себя клавиши Shift или Control;например,Shift+Tab.

trans-unit.source: A Behavior defines the default animation to be applied whenever a particular property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Поведение определяет анимацию по умолчанию,которая будет применяться всякий раз,когда изменяется конкретное значение свойства.

trans-unit.source: A Binary Space Partitioning tree is applied. All QGraphicsScene's item location algorithms are of an order close to logarithmic complexity, by making use of binary search. Adding, moving and removing items is logarithmic. This approach is best for static scenes (i.e., scenes where most items do not move).
trans-unit.target: Применяется дерево разбиения двоичного пространства. Все алгоритмы определения местоположения элементов QGraphicsScene имеют порядок, близкий к логарифмической сложности, за счет использования двоичного поиска. Добавление, перемещение и удаление элементов осуществляется логарифмически. Этот подход лучше всего подходит для статических сцен (т. Е. Сцен, где большинство элементов не движется).

trans-unit.source: A Bluetooth Low Energy peripheral device can contain multiple services. In turn each service may include further services. This class represents a single service of the peripheral device and is created via QLowEnergyController::createServiceObject(). The type() indicates whether this service is a primary (top-level) service or whether the service is part of another service. Each service may contain one or more characteristics and each characteristic may contain descriptors. The resulting structure may look like the following diagram:
trans-unit.target: Периферийное устройство Bluetooth с низким энергопотреблением может содержать несколько служб. В свою очередь, каждая услуга может включать в себя дополнительные услуги. Этот класс представляет отдельную службу периферийного устройства и создается с помощью QLowEnergyController :: createServiceObject (). Тип () указывает на то эта услуга является ли первичной услуги (верхнего уровня) , или службы является частью другой службы. Каждая услуга может содержать одну или несколько характеристик, и каждая характеристика может содержать дескрипторы. Полученная структура может выглядеть как на следующей схеме:

trans-unit.source: A Bodymovin player for Qt. More...
trans-unit.target: Плеер Bodymovin для Qt. Больше...

trans-unit.source: A BorderImage breaks a source image, specified using the source property, into 9 regions, as shown below:

A BorderImage is used to display the image, and it is given a size that is larger than the original image. Since the horizontalTileMode property is set to BorderImage.Stretch, the parts of image in regions 2 and 8 are stretched horizontally. Since the verticalTileMode property is set to BorderImage.Stretch, the parts of image in regions 4 and 6 are stretched vertically.
A BoundaryRule defines the range of values that a particular property is allowed to have. When an out-of-range value would otherwise be set, it applies "resistance" via an easing curve.
A C++ API for low-level access and control.
trans-unit.target: C++API для низкоуровневого доступа и управления.

trans-unit.source: A C++ class is documented with the \class command.
trans-unit.target: Класс C ++ документируется с помощью команды \ class .

trans-unit.source: A C++ class is documented with the \class command. The annotation for the class is taken from the argument of the class comment's \brief command.
trans-unit.target: Класс C ++ документируется с помощью команды \ class . Аннотация для класса берется из аргумента команды \ short комментария к классу .

trans-unit.source: A C++ class is documented with the \class command.
A C++ class is documented with the \class command. The annotation for the class is taken from the argument of the class comment's \brief command.

A C++ model class can be defined as a QStringList, a QVariantList, a QObjectList or a QAbstractItemModel. The first three are useful for exposing simpler datasets, while QAbstractItemModel provides a more flexible solution for more complex models.
trans-unit.target: Класс модели C ++ может быть определен как QStringList , QVariantList , QObjectList или QAbstractItemModel . Первые три полезны для отображения более простых наборов данных, тогда как QAbstractItemModel предоставляет более гибкое решение для более сложных моделей.

trans-unit.source: A CAN bus error occurred.
trans-unit.target: Произошла ошибка CAN-шины.

trans-unit.source: A CSS stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: Таблица стилей CSS.

trans-unit.source: A CSS-style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Простыня в стиле CSS.

trans-unit.source: A Camera is always necessary to view the content of a 3D scene. A camera defines how to project the content of a 3D scene into a 2D coordinate space, which can then be used on a 2D surface. When a camera is present in the scene it can be used to direct what is displayed in a View3D.
A CameraSelector can be used to select the camera, which is used by the FrameGraph when drawing the entities.

A CheckBox is an option button that can be toggled on (checked) or off (unchecked). Checkboxes are typically used to represent features in an application that can be enabled or disabled without affecting others.

A ColorDialog window is automatically transient for its parent window. So whether you declare the dialog inside an Item or inside a Window, the dialog will appear centered over the window containing the item, or over the Window that you declared.
A ColorDialogRequest is passed as an argument of the WebEngineView::colorDialogRequested signal. It is generated when a color picker dialog is requested. See HTML5 Color State.
A Column animate items using specific transitions when items are added to or moved within a Column.
trans-unit.target: Колонка анимирует элементы,используя определенные переходы,когда элементы добавляются к колонке или перемещаются внутри нее.

trans-unit.source: A ComputeCommand is used to issue work for the compute shader. The compute shader is specified in the Material component of the same entity the ComputeCommand is added to. The workGroupX, workGroupY and workGroupZ properties specify the work group sizes for the compute shader invocation. DispatchCompute node needs to be present in the FrameGraph to actually issue the commands. The execution behavior of the compute command can be controlled with the run type property.
A Connections object creates a connection to a QML signal.
trans-unit.target: Объект Соединения создает соединение с QML сигналом.

trans-unit.source: A ContextMenuRequest is passed as an argument of the WebEngineView::contextMenuRequested signal. It provides further information about the context of the request. The position of the request origin can be found via the x and y properties.
A Controller Area Network (CAN) is a vehicle bus standard designed to allow microcontrollers and devices to communicate with each other in applications without a host computer.
trans-unit.target: Сеть контроллеров (CAN)является стандартом автомобильной шины,предназначенной для обеспечения связи микроконтроллеров и устройств друг с другом в приложениях без хост-компьютера.

trans-unit.source: A Ctrl key on the keyboard is pressed.
trans-unit.target: На клавиатуре нажата клавиша Ctrl.

trans-unit.source: A Ctrl key on the keyboard must be pressed.
A D-Bus function that takes an integer, a D-Bus variant and a string as parameters can be called with the following argument list (see QDBusMessage::setArguments()):
trans-unit.target: Функция D-Bus, которая принимает целое число, вариант D-Bus и строку в качестве параметров, может быть вызвана со следующим списком аргументов (см. QDBusMessage :: setArguments ()):

trans-unit.source: A D-Bus variant type can contain any type, including other variants. It is similar to the Qt QVariant type.
trans-unit.target: Тип варианта D-Bus может содержать любой тип, включая другие варианты. Он похож на тип Qt QVariant .

trans-unit.source: A DBus signal is emitted from one application and is received by all applications that are listening for that signal from that interface.
trans-unit.target: Сигнал шины DBus излучается от одного приложения и принимается всеми приложениями,которые прослушивают этот сигнал от этого интерфейса.

trans-unit.source: A DBus signal is emitted from one application and is received only by the application owning the destination
trans-unit.target: Сигнал шины DBus исходит от одного приложения и принимается только приложением,которому принадлежит назначение.

trans-unit.source: A DNS host name entry; the entry contains a host name entry that the certificate is valid for. The entry may contain wildcards.
trans-unit.target: Запись DNS имени узла;эта запись содержит запись имени узла,для которого действителен сертификат.Запись может содержать подстановочные знаки.

trans-unit.source: A DTLS connection may be closed using shutdown().
trans-unit.target: DTLS-соединение можно закрыть с помощью shutdown ().

trans-unit.source: A DelayButton after being activated
A DelayButton being held down

A DepthTest type is used to enable depth testing with a given depth test function. The depth test enables writing fragment color values when the depth test passes, and reject fragments which fail the test. The depth test uses the depth function to test the fragments depth value to the value against z-buffer. If the underlying surface does not have z-buffer, the DepthTest does nothing.
A Dialog Without Auto-Connect
trans-unit.target: Диалог без автоподключения

trans-unit.source: A Dialog in English
trans-unit.target: Диалог на английском языке

trans-unit.source: A Dialog in French
trans-unit.target: Диалог на французском языке

trans-unit.source: A DispatchCompute allows work to be issued for the compute shader to run on the GPU. The workGroupX, workGroupY and workGroupZ properties specify the work group sizes for the compute shader invocation. ComputeCommand components need to be added to entities to instruct Qt3D to select the materials and geometry from the entities for the compute invocation. The work group sizes for the shader invocation will be the maximum of the work group sizes specified in DispatchCompute and ComputeCommand.

A Dithering type enables dithering. Dithering adds noise to the color values to randomize quantization error in order to prevent large scale patterns in the final image, such as banding. Dithering is most useful when rendering to a surface with low color bit depth, such as RGB565 or RGBA4444.
trans-unit.target: Тип Dithering (сглаживание)позволяет сглаживание.Сглаживание добавляет шум к значениям цвета для рандомизации ошибки квантования,чтобы предотвратить крупномасштабные шаблоны в конечном изображении,такие как полосчатость.Сглаживание наиболее полезно при рендеринге на поверхности с низкой битовой глубиной цвета,например RGB565 или RGBA4444.

trans-unit.source: A DropArea is an invisible item which receives events when other items are dragged over it.

A FileDialog window is automatically transient for its parent window. So whether you declare the dialog inside an Item or inside a Window, the dialog will appear centered over the window containing the item, or over the Window that you declared.
A FileDialogRequest is passed as an argument of the WebEngineView::fileDialogRequested signal. It is generated when the file dialog is requested by the input element. See File Upload state.
A FilterKey is a storage type for filter key and value pair. Filter keys are used by Technique and RenderPass to specify at which stage of rendering the technique or the render pass is used.

A FontDialog window is automatically transient for its parent window. So whether you declare the dialog inside an Item or inside a Window, the dialog will appear centered over the window containing the item, or over the Window that you declared.
A FrameRateRange represents a range of frame rates as minimum and maximum rate. More...
A FrontFace sets the winding direction of the front facing polygons.

A FrustumCulling type enables frustum culling of the drawable entities based on the camera view and Geometry bounds of the entities. If FrustumCulling is present in the FrameGraph, only the entities whose Geometry bounds intersect with the camera frustum, i.e. the view of the camera, are drawn. If FrustumCulling is not present, all drawable entities will be drawn. The camera is selected by a CameraSelector frame graph node in the current hierarchy. Frustum culling can save a lot of GPU processing time when the rendered scene is complex.

A Geometry type is used to group a list of Attribute objects together to form a geometric shape Qt3D is able to render using GeometryRenderer. Special attribute can be set in order to calculate bounding volume of the shape.
trans-unit.target: Тип Geometry используется для группировки списка объектов Attribute вместе для формирования геометрической формы, которую Qt3D может визуализировать с помощью GeometryRenderer . Для расчета ограничивающего объема фигуры можно установить специальный атрибут.

trans-unit.source: A GeometryRenderer holds all the information necessary to draw a Geometry. A Geometry holds the coordinates of the geometry data - GeometryRenderer specifies how to interpret that data.

A Grid creates a grid of cells that is large enough to hold all of its child items, and places these items in the cells from left to right and top to bottom. Each item is positioned at the top-left corner of its cell with position (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: Сетка создает сетку из ячеек,достаточно большую,чтобы вместить все свои детские предметы,и помещает эти предметы в ячейки слева направо и сверху вниз.Каждый элемент располагается в левом верхнем углу своей ячейки с положением (0,0).

trans-unit.source: A Grid defaults to four columns, and creates as many rows as are necessary to fit all of its child items. The number of rows and columns can be constrained by setting the rows and columns properties.
trans-unit.target: По умолчанию для Grid используется четыре столбца, и создается столько строк, сколько необходимо для размещения всех его дочерних элементов. Количество строк и столбцов можно ограничить, задав свойства строк и столбцов .

trans-unit.source: A GridView displays data from models created from built-in QML types like ListModel and XmlListModel, or custom model classes defined in C++ that inherit from QAbstractListModel.

A GridView has a model, which defines the data to be displayed, and a delegate, which defines how the data should be displayed. Items in a GridView are laid out horizontally or vertically. Grid views are inherently flickable as GridView inherits from Flickable.
A HiFi audio device.
trans-unit.target: Звуковое устройство HiFi.

trans-unit.source: A HorizontalHeaderView provides labeling of the columns of a TableView. To add a horizontal header to a TableView, bind the syncView property to the TableView:
A Instantiator can be used to control the dynamic creation of objects, or to dynamically create multiple objects from a template.
trans-unit.target: Instantiator можно использовать для управления динамическим созданием объектов или для динамического создания нескольких объектов из шаблона.

trans-unit.source: A JSON array is a list of values. The list can be manipulated by inserting and removing QJsonValue's from the array.
trans-unit.target: Массив JSON - это список значений. Список можно изменять, вставляя и удаляя значения QJsonValue из массива.

trans-unit.source: A JSON document can be converted from its text-based representation to a QJsonDocument using QJsonDocument::fromJson(). toJson() converts it back to text. The parser is very fast and efficient and converts the JSON to the binary representation used by Qt.
trans-unit.target: Документ JSON можно преобразовать из его текстового представления в QJsonDocument с помощью QJsonDocument :: fromJson (). toJson () преобразует его обратно в текст. Парсер очень быстрый и эффективный и преобразует JSON в двоичное представление, используемое Qt.

trans-unit.source: A JSON document can be converted from its text-based representation to a QJsonDocument using QJsonDocument::fromJson(). toJson() converts it back to text. The parser is very fast and efficient and converts the JSON to the binary representation used by Qt.
A JSON object is a list of key value pairs, where the keys are unique strings and the values are represented by a QJsonValue.
trans-unit.target: Объект JSON - это список пар ключ-значение, где ключи представляют собой уникальные строки, а значения представлены QJsonValue .

trans-unit.source: A JavaScript alert dialog.
trans-unit.target: Диалог предупреждений JavaScript.

trans-unit.source: A JavaScript confirmation dialog.
trans-unit.target: Диалог подтверждения JavaScript.

trans-unit.source: A JavaScript expression which describes a property's relationship with other properties. The variables in this expression are called the property's
trans-unit.target: JavaScript выражение,которое описывает отношение свойства к другим свойствам.Переменные в этом выражении называются свойствами

trans-unit.source: A JavaScript prompt dialog.
trans-unit.target: Диалоговое окно запроса JavaScript.

trans-unit.source: A JavaScript resource declaration allows a JavaScript file to be exposed via the given identifier.
trans-unit.target: JavaScript-декларация ресурсов позволяет выставлять JavaScript-файл через заданный идентификатор.

trans-unit.source: A JavaScript resource may import a QML module in the following fashion:
trans-unit.target: Ресурс JavaScript может импортировать модуль QML следующим образом:

trans-unit.source: A JavaScript resource may import another in the following fashion:
trans-unit.target: Ресурс JavaScript может импортировать другой ресурс следующим образом:

trans-unit.source: A JavaScriptDialogRequest is passed as an argument of the WebEngineView::javaScriptDialogRequested signal. The request is emitted if JavaScript on the page calls HTML5's Simple Dialogs API, or in response to HTML5's BeforeUnloadEvent. The type of a particular dialog can be checked with the type property.

A KeyframeAnimation type implements simple keyframe animation that can be used to animate Transform. The keyframes consists of multiple timed Qt3D.Core::Transforms, which are interpolated and applied to the target Transform. EasingCurve is used between keyframes to control the interpolator. RepeatMode can be set for when the position set to the KeyframeAnimation is less or or greater than the values defined in the keyframe positions.
A Layer can be applied to a subtree of entities by setting the recursive property to true.
trans-unit.target: Слой может быть применен к поддереву сущностей,установив рекурсивное свойство true.

trans-unit.source: A LayerFilter can be used to instruct the renderer as to which layer(s) to draw in that branch of the frame graph. The LayerFilter selects which entities to draw based on the Layer instances added to the LayerFilter and as components to the Entity.
A LevelOfDetailLoader will load the entity matching the LevelOfDetail::currentIndex. The source is selected from the sources property.

A ListView displays data from models created from built-in QML types like ListModel and XmlListModel, or custom model classes defined in C++ that inherit from QAbstractItemModel or QAbstractListModel.

A ListView has a model, which defines the data to be displayed, and a delegate, which defines how the data should be displayed. Items in a ListView are laid out horizontally or vertically. List views are inherently flickable because ListView inherits from Flickable.

A MapGestureArea is automatically created with a new Map and available with the gesture property. This is the only way to create a MapGestureArea, and once created this way cannot be destroyed without its parent Map.
A MemoryBarrier FrameGraph node is used to emplace a specific memory barrier at a specific time of the rendering. This is required to properly synchronize drawing and compute commands on the GPU.

A MessageDialog window is automatically transient for its parent window. So whether you declare the dialog inside an Item or inside a Window, the dialog will appear centered over the window containing the item, or over the Window that you declared.
A Meta key on the keyboard is pressed.
trans-unit.target: На клавиатуре нажата Мета-клавиша.

trans-unit.source: A Meta key on the keyboard must be pressed.
A Metal-based QRhi needs no special parameters for initialization.
A Mifare target.
trans-unit.target: Цель Мифара.

trans-unit.source: A Minimal qdocconf File
trans-unit.target: Минимальный файл qdocconf.

trans-unit.source: A Modbus request usually consists of a single byte describing the FunctionCode and N bytes of payload
trans-unit.target: Запрос Modbus обычно состоит из одного байта, описывающего FunctionCode и N байтов полезной нагрузки.

trans-unit.source: A Modbus specific protocol error occurred.
trans-unit.target: Произошла ошибка протокола Modbus.

trans-unit.source: A MorphTarget type is a convenience type, which provides a list of Attributes, which the MorphingAnimation uses to animate geometry. A MorphTarget can also be created based on existing Geometry.

A MorphingAnimation type implements blend-shape morphing animation to a target GeometryRenderer. The MorphingAnimation sets the correct Attributes from the morph targets to the target GeometryRenderer::geometry and calculates interpolator for the current position. The actual blending between the attributes must be implemented in the material. MorphPhongMaterial implements material with morphing support for phong lighting model. The blending happens between 2 attributes - 'base' and 'target'. The names for the base and target attributes are taken from the morph target names, where the base attribute retains the name it already has and the target attribute name gets 'Target' appended to the name. All morph targets in the animation should contain the attributes with same names as those in the base geometry.

A MouseArea is an invisible item that is typically used in conjunction with a visible item in order to provide mouse handling for that item. By effectively acting as a proxy, the logic for mouse handling can be contained within a MouseArea item.

A MouseDevice delegates mouse events from physical mouse device to MouseHandler objects. The sensitivity of the mouse can be controlled with the MouseDevice::sensitivity property, which specifies the rate in which the logical mouse coordinates change in response to physical movement of the mouse.
A Multi Viewport FrameGraph
trans-unit.target: ФреймГрафик нескольких видов

trans-unit.source: A MultiPointTouchArea is an invisible item that is used to track multiple touch points.
A MultiSampleAntiAliasing type enables multisample antialiasing.
A NoDepthMask type disables fragment depth write to depth buffer.
A Node does not have a url that other nodes can connect to, and thus is able to acquire replicas only. It is not able to share source objects.
trans-unit.target: Узел не имеет урлы,к которым другие узлы могут подключаться,и,таким образом,может приобретать только реплики.Он не может совместно использовать исходные объекты.

trans-unit.source: A NodeInstantiator can be used to control the dynamic creation of nodes, or to dynamically create multiple objects from a template.

trans-unit.source: A PDU is considered valid if the message code is in the range of 1 to 255 decimal and the PDU's compound size (function code + data) does not exceed 253 bytes. A default constructed PDU is invalid.
trans-unit.target: PDU считается действительным,если код сообщения находится в диапазоне от 1 до 255 знаков после запятой,а составной размер PDU (код функции+данные)не превышает 253 байт.Построенный по умолчанию PDU недействителен.

trans-unit.target: Жест Pan.

trans-unit.source: A PaperSource defined by the printer that is unknown to Qt
trans-unit.target: Источник бумаги,определяемый принтером,который неизвестен Qt

trans-unit.source: A Parameter can be referenced by a RenderPass, Technique, Effect, Material, TechniqueFilter, RenderPassFilter. At runtime, depending on which shader is selected for a given step of the rendering, the value contained in a Parameter will be converted and uploaded if the shader contains a uniform with a name matching that of the Parameter.
trans-unit.target: На параметр можно ссылаться с помощью RenderPass , Technique, Effect, Material, TechniqueFilter , RenderPassFilter . Во время выполнения, в зависимости от того, какой шейдер выбран для данного шага рендеринга, значение, содержащееся в параметре, будет преобразовано и выгружено, если шейдер содержит форму с именем, совпадающим с именем параметра.

trans-unit.source: A Parameter defined on a Material is overridden by a Parameter (of the same name) defined in a TechniqueFilter or a RenderPassFilter.
trans-unit.target: Параметр, определенный в Материале, переопределяется параметром (с тем же именем), определенным в TechniqueFilter или RenderPassFilter .

trans-unit.source: A Parameter defined on an Effect is overridden by a QParameter (of the same name) defined in a Material, TechniqueFilter, RenderPassFilter.
trans-unit.target: Параметр, определенный в эффекте, переопределяется параметром QParameter (с тем же именем), определенным в материалах, TechniqueFilter , RenderPassFilter .

trans-unit.source: A ParentAnimation can contain any number of animations. These animations will be run in parallel; to run them sequentially, define them within a SequentialAnimation.
A Path is composed of one or more path segments - PathLine, PathPolyline, PathQuad, PathCubic, PathArc, PathAngleArc, PathCurve, PathSvg.
A Path is composed of one or more path segments - PathLine, PathQuad, PathCubic, PathArc, PathAngleArc, PathCurve, PathSvg.
trans-unit.target: Путь состоит из одного или нескольких сегментов пути - PathLine , PathQuad , PathCubic , PathArc , PathAngleArc , PathCurve , PathSvg .

trans-unit.source: A PathView displays data from models created from built-in QML types like ListModel and XmlListModel, or custom model classes defined in C++ that inherit from QAbstractListModel.
A Pinch gesture.
trans-unit.target: Жест ущипки.

trans-unit.source: A PinchArea is an invisible item that is typically used in conjunction with a visible item in order to provide pinch gesture handling for that item.

A Place is almost always tied to a plugin. The plugin property must be set before it is possible to call save(), remove() or getDetails(). The reviewModel, imageModel and editorialModel are only valid then the plugin property is set.
trans-unit.target: Место почти всегда связано с плагином . Свойство плагина должно быть установлено до того, как можно будет вызвать save () , remove () или getDetails () . ReviewModel , imageModel и editorialModel действительны только тогда плагин свойство устанавливается.

trans-unit.source: A PointerEvent is an event describing contact or movement across a surface, provided by a mouse, a touchpoint (single finger on a touchscreen), or a stylus on a graphics tablet. The device property provides more information about where the event came from.

A PolygonOffset type adds an offset to the fragment depth value prior to depth test and depth write. The offset can be used to avoid z-fighting when rendering polygons with very close depth values such as decals.
A PropertyChanges object can also override the default signal handler for an object to implement a signal handler specific to the new state:
A Puck (a device that is similar to a flat mouse with a transparent circle with cross-hairs).
trans-unit.target: Шайба (устройство,похожее на плоскую мышь с прозрачным кругом с перекрестиями).

trans-unit.source: A QAbstractItemDelegate provides the interface and common functionality for delegates in the model/view architecture. Delegates display individual items in views, and handle the editing of model data.

trans-unit.source: A QAction may contain an icon, menu text, a shortcut, status text, "What's This?" text, and a tooltip. Most of these can be set in the constructor. They can also be set independently with setIcon(), setText(), setIconText(), setShortcut(), setStatusTip(), setWhatsThis(), and setToolTip(). For menu items, it is possible to set an individual font with setFont().
A QActionGroup emits an triggered() signal when one of its actions is chosen. Each action in an action group emits its triggered() signal as usual.
A QAudioDeviceInfo is used by Qt to construct classes that communicate with the device--such as QAudioInput, and QAudioOutput.

A QAxObject can be instantiated as an empty object, with the name of the COM object it should wrap, or with a pointer to the IUnknown that represents an existing COM object. If the COM object implements the IDispatch interface, the properties, methods and events of that object become available as Qt properties, slots and signals. The base class, QAxBase, provides an API to access the COM object directly through the IUnknown pointer.

A QAxWidget can be instantiated as an empty object, with the name of the ActiveX control it should wrap, or with an existing interface pointer to the ActiveX control. The ActiveX control's properties, methods and events which only use QAxBase supported data types, become available as Qt properties, slots and signals. The base class QAxBase provides an API to access the ActiveX directly through the IUnknown pointer.
A QBackingStore contains a buffered representation of the window contents, and thus supports partial updates by using QPainter to only update a sub region of the window contents.

A QBitArray is an array that gives access to individual bits and provides operators (AND, OR, XOR, and NOT) that work on entire arrays of bits. It uses implicit sharing (copy-on-write) to reduce memory usage and to avoid the needless copying of data.
A QByteArray can embed '\0' bytes. The size() function always returns the size of the whole array, including embedded '\0' bytes, but excluding the terminating '\0' added by QByteArray. For example:
A QCalendar object maps a year, month, and day-number to a specific day (ultimately identified by its Julian day number), using the rules of a particular system.
A QCalendar value is immutable.
A QCameraInfo can be used to construct a QCamera. The following example instantiates a QCamera whose camera device is named 'mycamera':

A QCheckBox is an option button that can be switched on (checked) or off (unchecked). Checkboxes are typically used to represent features in an application that can be enabled or disabled without affecting others. Different types of behavior can be implemented. For example, a QButtonGroup can be used to group check buttons logically, allowing exclusive checkboxes. However, QButtonGroup does not provide any visual representation.
A QCollator object can be used together with template based sorting algorithms such as std::sort to sort a list of QStrings.
A QComboBox provides a means of presenting a list of options to the user in a way that takes up the minimum amount of screen space.
A QCompleter is used typically with a QLineEdit or QComboBox. For example, here's how to provide auto completions from a simple word list in a QLineEdit:
A QDBusPendingCall object is a reference to a method call that was sent over D-Bus without waiting for a reply. QDBusPendingCall is an opaque type, meant to be used as a handle for a pending reply.

A QDBusReply object is a subset of the QDBusMessage object that represents a method call's reply. It contains only the first output argument or the error code and is used by QDBusInterface-derived classes to allow returning the error code as the function's return argument.
A QDBusServiceWatcher object can be used to notify the application about an ownership change of a service name on the bus. It has three watch modes:

A QDate object is typically created by giving the year, month, and day numbers explicitly. Note that QDate interprets year numbers less than 100 as presented, i.e., as years 1 through 99, without adding any offset. The static function currentDate() creates a QDate object containing the date read from the system clock. An explicit date can also be set using setDate(). The fromString() function returns a QDate given a string and a date format which is used to interpret the date within the string.

A QDate object represents a particular day, regardless of calendar, locale or other settings used when creating it or supplied by the system. It can report the year, month and day of the month that represent the day with respect to the proleptic Gregorian calendar or any calendar supplied as a QCalendar object.

A QDateTime object encodes a calendar date and a clock time (a "datetime"). It combines features of the QDate and QTime classes. It can read the current datetime from the system clock. It provides functions for comparing datetimes and for manipulating a datetime by adding a number of seconds, days, months, or years.

A QDateTime object is typically created either by giving a date and time explicitly in the constructor, or by using a static function such as currentDateTime() or fromMSecsSinceEpoch(). The date and time can be changed with setDate() and setTime(). A datetime can also be set using the setMSecsSinceEpoch() function that takes the time, in milliseconds, since 00:00:00 on January 1, 1970. The fromString() function returns a QDateTime, given a string and a date format used to interpret the date within the string.

A QDepthTest class is used to enable depth testing with a given depth test function. The depth test enables writing fragment color values when the depth test passes, and reject fragments which fail the test. The depth test uses the depth function to test the fragments depth value to the value against z-buffer. If the underlying surface does not have z-buffer, then QDepthTest does nothing.

A QDir can point to a file using either a relative or an absolute path. Absolute paths begin with the directory separator (optionally preceded by a drive specification under Windows). Relative file names begin with a directory name or a file name and specify a path relative to the current directory.
A QDir is used to manipulate path names, access information regarding paths and files, and manipulate the underlying file system. It can also be used to access Qt's resource system.

A QDockWidget acts as a wrapper for its child widget, set with setWidget(). Custom size hints, minimum and maximum sizes and size policies should be implemented in the child widget. QDockWidget will respect them, adjusting its own constraints to include the frame and title. Size constraints should not be set on the QDockWidget itself, because they change depending on whether it is docked; a docked QDockWidget has no frame and a smaller title bar.
A QDockWidget consists of a title bar and the content area. The title bar displays the dock widgets window title, a
A QDomEntityReference object may be inserted into the DOM tree when an entity reference is in the source document, or when the user wishes to insert an entity reference.

A QDomNode can be converted into one of its subclasses using toAttr(), toCDATASection(), toDocumentFragment(), toDocument(), toDocumentType(), toElement(), toEntityReference(), toText(), toEntity(), toNotation(), toProcessingInstruction(), toCharacterData() or toComment(). You can convert a node to a null node with clear().

A QDomNode can be null, much like nullptr. Creating a copy of a null node results in another null node. It is not possible to modify a null node, but it is possible to assign another, possibly non-null node to it. In this case, the copy of the null node will remain null. You can check if a QDomNode is null by calling isNull(). The empty constructor of a QDomNode (or any of the derived classes) creates a null node.
A QEventTransition object binds an event to a particular QObject. QEventTransition is part of The State Machine Framework.

A QFileInfo can point to a file with either a relative or an absolute file path. Absolute file paths begin with the directory separator "/" (or with a drive specification on Windows). Relative file names begin with a directory name or a file name and specify a path relative to the current working directory. An example of an absolute path is the string "/tmp/quartz". A relative path might look like "src/fatlib". You can use the function isRelative() to check whether a QFileInfo is using a relative or an absolute file path. You can call the function makeAbsolute() to convert a relative QFileInfo's path to an absolute path.
A QFrameGraphNode used to select QTechniques to use
trans-unit.target: QFrameGraphNode,используемый для выбора QTechniques для использования

trans-unit.source: A QFrustumCulling class enables frustum culling of the drawable entities based on the camera view and QGeometry bounds of the entities. If QFrustumCulling is present in the FrameGraph, only the entities whose QGeometry bounds intersect with the camera frustum, i.e. the view of the camera, are drawn. If QFrustumCulling is not present, all drawable entities will be drawn. The camera is selected by a QCameraSelector frame graph node in the current hierarchy. Frustum culling can save a lot of GPU processing time when the rendered scene is complex.

A QGeoAreaMonitorInfo object is valid if it has a non-empty name and a valid area(). Such objects must be registered with a QGeoAreaMonitorSource to start and stop the monitoring process. Note that extensive monitoring can be very resource consuming because the positioning engine must remain active and has to match the current position with each QGeoAreaMonitorInfo instance.
A QGeoAreaMonitorSource emits signals when the current position is in range, or has moved out of range, of a specified area. Each area is specified by a QGeoAreaMonitorInfo object. For example:
A QGeoCoordinate is defined by latitude, longitude, and optionally, altitude.
A QGeoLocation consists of a coordinate and corresponding address, along with an optional bounding box which is the recommended region to be displayed when viewing the location.
A QGeoPath is both invalid and empty if it contains no coordinate.
A QGeoPositionInfo contains, at a minimum, a geographical coordinate and a timestamp. It may also have heading and speed measurements as well as estimates of the accuracy of the provided data.

A QGeoRoute object contains high level information about a route, such as the length the route, the estimated travel time for the route, and enough information to render a basic image of the route on a map.

A QGeoRouteSegment instance has information about the physical layout of the route segment, the length of the route and estimated time required to traverse the route segment and an optional QGeoManeuver associated with the beginning of the route segment.

A QGesture instance is implicitly created when needed and is owned by Qt. Developers should never destroy them or store them for later use as Qt may destroy particular instances of them and create new ones to replace them.
